response.original_title: Bum Hunts: Tales from the Bum Cage
response.overview: It's the WILDLY controversial video America CAN'T stop talking about...THE GREATEST PARTY VIDEO EVER PRODUCED-GUARANTEED!!! MOVE OVER CROCODILE HUNTER™ because NOW is YOUR chance to witness ALL of our infamous 100% UNCENSORED mayhem for the FIRST-TIME EVER on BUM HUNTS: TALES FROM THE BUM CAGE!™ These twisted 100% REAL street bums are out-of-their freaking minds-and this shockingly hilarious ALL-NEW NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN FOOTAGE proves it!!! Get prepared to witness this NON-STOP thrill-ride of unF'Nforgettable, maniacal, mind-blowing series of 100% REAL BUM mis-adventures, brutal attacks, and side-splitting spoofs including the controversial "BUM DATE!" "TRADING BOXES!" & the diabolically drunken "BUM RUN FOR RUM!" And the astonishing list goes on: Shocking stunts, totally insane interviews, unF'Nbelievable sadistic hidden camera pranks, ultra-sexy behind-the-scenes BUM BABE™ BONUS FOOTAGE, and of course, WILDLY OUTRAGEOUS BUM HUNTS™
response.tagline: THE GREATEST PARTY VIDEO EVER PRODUCED-GUARANTEED!!!
